text: Child marriage is practiced in some parts of Pakistan, with the highest prevalence in the Sindh province amd Azad Kashmir. It disproportionately affects the girl child.Goonesekere, Savitri, Children, Law and Justice: A south Asian Perspective, p. 20. Early and child marriage are directly attributable to deep-rooted gender inequalities, traditional practices, and customs. ==References== Category:Types of marriage
title: Child marriage in Pakistan
